name: Chrono Compass
description: Navigate time's intricate pathways with the Chrono Compass. Crafted by ChronoTech, this whimsical yet precise gadget ensures you're always on schedule, no matter the era. It's your ultimate guide through the tides of history. Time travel? Now as easy as reading a compass!

name: Era-Adjustable Sunglasses
description: Stay effortlessly cool through centuries with Era-Adjustable Sunglasses from EonVision Corp. Whether facing blazing medieval suns or futuristic neon skies, these shades adapt to every era's glare. The future's so bright, you gotta wear shades, one size fits all.

name: Quantum Pocket Watch
description: Count down moments with style using the Quantum Pocket Watch. QuantaCraft's creation melds classic elegance with futuristic precision, offering a timepiece that's truly timeless. The perfect accessory for chrono-enthusiasts and retro-futurists alike.

name: Time-Warping Top Hat
description: Elevate your time-travel style with the Time-Warping Top Hat from TimeHopper Co. Step into history elegantly with this hat that's not just headgearâ€”it's a portal to eras past and future. A top hat that transcends fashion trends.
